name: Z`code (VR for HTC Vive)
developer: Shenzhen Weilaishijie Network Technology Co., Ltd.
publisher: Shenzhen Weilaishijie Network Technology Co., Ltd.
description: "Z'code is a First-Person Mech Fighting game in VR. Players will simulate driving armor in the fight on Earth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7 SP1 or higher. Processor: CPU Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or more; Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or more; DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win10 or higher. Processor: CPU Intel Core i7-6700 or AMD FX 8370 or more; Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon R9 380 or more; DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 5 GB available space
